name: VulcAAn City Protector!
description: For VulcanJam I decided to improve my Unity-foo to make a modern remake of an Atari classic. I've made art assets for Unity plenty of times, but up to this point I've considered myself weak when it came to the scripting aspect. This gave me a chance to use the API a bit more. The unfortunate part: I didn't have the time to add SOUND EFFECTS!! Next time I should be sentenced to making a sound-based game.... Hope that you enjoy playing it! Thanks for giving it a shot!
